com.dotcms.publishing

Interface IBundler


  • public interface IBundler
    The Purpose of the IGenerators is to provide a way to say how to write out the different parts and objects of the bundle
    Author:
    jasontesser

      • generate

        void generate(java.io.File bundleRoot,
            BundlerStatus status)
              throws DotBundleException
        Generates depending of the type of content this Bundler handles parts and objects that will be add it later to a Bundle.
        Parameters:
        bundleRoot - Where the Bundle we are creating will live.
        status - Object to keep track of the generation process inside this Bundler
        Throws:
        DotBundleException - If there is an exception while this Bundles is generating the Bundle content
